languages.text: "Мы пойдем следом — пока что будем сдерживать еретиков, которые пытаются лезть через щели на подмогу своим, и заодно взглянем на генераторы. Эти лихоимцы что-то накрутили в кабелях... эх, нам бы техномата в помощь, но посмотрим, что можем сами сделать".

traits.locale_text: "Мы пойдем следом — пока что будем сдерживать еретиков, которые пытаются лезть через щели на подмогу своим, и заодно взглянем на генераторы. Эти лихоимцы что-то накрутили в кабелях... эх, нам бы техномата в помощь, но посмотрим, что можем сами сделать".

languages.text: "We will follow. For now, we will hold off any heretics who might try to crawl in through the cracks to join the main assault, and we'll take a look at the generators while we're at it. Those villains made a mess of the cables... Oh, I wish we had a technomat with us, but we'll see what we can do without one."
languages.original_text: "Мы пойдем следом — пока что будем сдерживать еретиков, которые пытаются лезть через щели на подмогу своим, и заодно взглянем на генераторы. Эти лихоимцы что-то накрутили в кабелях... эх, нам бы техномата в помощь, но посмотрим, что можем сами сделать".

traits.locale_text: "We will follow. We're no use in a fight, my {mf|lord|lady}, but if we end up having to go upstairs to operate equipment, fix communications, restore systems to life — we'll be the ones to do it!"
"We will follow. We're no use in a fight, my {mf|lord|lady}, but if we end up having to go upstairs to operate equipment, fix communications, restore systems to life — we'll be the ones to do it!"

"We will follow. For now, we will hold off any heretics who might try to crawl in through the cracks to join the main assault, and we'll take a look at the generators while we're at it. Those villains made a mess of the cables... Oh, I wish we had a technomat with us, but we'll see what we can do without one."

"We will follow. For now, we will hold off any heretics who might try to crawl in through the cracks to join the main assault, and we'll take a look at the generators while we're at it. Those villains made a mess of the cables... Oh, I wish we had a technomat with us, but we'll see what we can do without one."

"We will follow. For now, we will hold off any heretics who might try to crawl in through the cracks to join the main assault, and we'll take a look at the generators while we're at it. Those villains made a mess of the cables... Oh, I wish we had a technomat with us, but we'll see what we can do without one."

languages.text: “我们也会跟上。如果有异端分子打算从什么地方冲出来，加入袭击的话，我们可以拖住他们。我们也打算趁这个机会检查一下发电机，那群杂碎把电缆搞得一团糟……噢，这种时候，要是能有位技工就好了。不过，我们看看能不能做些什么吧。”
languages.original_text: "We will follow. For now, we will hold off any heretics who might try to crawl in through the cracks to join the main assault, and we'll take a look at the generators while we're at it. Those villains made a mess of the cables... Oh, I wish we had a technomat with us, but we'll see what we can do without one."

traits.locale_text: “我们也会跟上。如果有异教徒打算从什么地方冲出来，加入袭击的话，我们可以拖住他们。我们也打算趁这个机会检查一下发电机，那群杂碎把电缆搞得一团糟……噢，这种时候，要是能有位机械殉道者就好了。不过，我们看看能不能做些什么吧。”

languages.text: «L{mf|e|a} seguiremos. Por ahora, rechazaremos a todos los herejes que intenten colarse para unirse a la fuerza de asalto principal, y, de paso, echaremos un vistazo a los generadores. Esos villanos han destrozado los cables... Ojalá tuviéramos un tecnómata entre los nuestros, pero haremos lo que podamos».
languages.original_text: "We will follow. For now, we will hold off any heretics who might try to crawl in through the cracks to join the main assault, and we'll take a look at the generators while we're at it. Those villains made a mess of the cables... Oh, I wish we had a technomat with us, but we'll see what we can do without one."

traits.locale_text: «L{mf|e|a} seguiremos. Por ahora, rechazaremos a todos los herejes que intenten colarse para unirse a la fuerza de asalto principal, y, de paso, echaremos un vistazo a los generadores. Esos villanos han destrozado los cables... Ojalá tuviéramos un tecnómata entre los nuestros, pero haremos lo que podamos».

languages.text: 「私達もご同行いたします。今は、隙間から忍び込んでメインの攻撃に参加しようとする異端者を阻止し、ついでにジェネレーターも調べておきます。悪党どもは、ケーブルをごちゃごちゃにしたようです…ああ、テクノマットがいればよかったのですが、いない中で何ができるか見てみましょう」
languages.original_text: "We will follow. For now, we will hold off any heretics who might try to crawl in through the cracks to join the main assault, and we'll take a look at the generators while we're at it. Those villains made a mess of the cables... Oh, I wish we had a technomat with us, but we'll see what we can do without one."

traits.locale_text: 「我々も後を追う。今のところ、割れた所から侵入してメインの攻撃に参加しようとする異端者を阻止する。その間に発電機を見てみるつもりだ。悪党たちは、 ケーブルをごちゃごちゃにした…ああ、テクノマットがあればよかったのですが、テクノマットなしで何ができるか見てみましょう」
「私達もご同行いたします。今は、隙間から忍び込んでメインの攻撃に参加しようとする異端者を阻止し、ついでにジェネレーターも調べておきます。悪党どもは、ケーブルをごちゃごちゃにしたようです…ああ、テクノマットがいればよかったのですが、いない中で何ができるか見てみましょう」

languages.text: « Nous vous suivrons. Pour l'instant, nous allons retenir les hérétiques qui tenteront de s'infiltrer pour rejoindre l'assaut principal, et nous en profiterons pour jeter un coup d'œil aux générateurs. Ces scélérats se sont attaqués aux câbles... J'aurais préféré pouvoir compter sur un technomate, mais hélas, il va falloir nous débrouiller par nous-mêmes. »
languages.original_text: "We will follow. For now, we will hold off any heretics who might try to crawl in through the cracks to join the main assault, and we'll take a look at the generators while we're at it. Those villains made a mess of the cables... Oh, I wish we had a technomat with us, but we'll see what we can do without one."

traits.locale_text: « Nous vous suivrons. Pour l'instant, nous allons retenir les hérétiques qui tenteront de s'infiltrer pour rejoindre l'assaut principal, et nous en profiterons pour jeter un coup d'œil aux générateurs. Ces scélérats se sont attaqués aux câbles... J'aurais préféré pouvoir compter sur un technomate, mais hélas, il va falloir nous débrouiller par nous-mêmes. »

languages.text: "Wir werden nachkommen. Für den Moment werden wir alle Ketzer aufhalten, die sich durch die Risse einschleichen und am Hauptangriff teilnehmen wollen, und wir werden uns dabei auch gleich die Generatoren ansehen. Diese Schurken haben ein Chaos bei den Kabeln angerichtet ... Oh, ich wünschte, wir hätten einen Technomaten bei uns, aber dann muss es eben ohne gehen."
languages.original_text: "We will follow. For now, we will hold off any heretics who might try to crawl in through the cracks to join the main assault, and we'll take a look at the generators while we're at it. Those villains made a mess of the cables... Oh, I wish we had a technomat with us, but we'll see what we can do without one."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden nachkommen. Für den Moment werden wir alle Ketzer aufhalten, die sich durch die Risse einschleichen und am Hauptangriff teilnehmen wollen, und wir werden uns dabei auch gleich die Generatoren ansehen. Diese Schurken haben ein Chaos bei den Kabeln angerichtet ... Oh, ich wünschte, wir hätten einen Technomaten bei uns, aber dann muss es eben ohne gehen."

languages.text: "Biz de peşinizden geleceğiz. Şimdilik sağdan soldan fırlayıp ana saldırıya katılmaya kalkışan kâfirleri püskürtelim ve hazır buradayken jeneratörlere de göz atalım. Şer uşakları, kabloları perişan etmişler. Keşke bir teknomatımız olsaydı... Neyse, onsuz elimizden ne gelir, bakalım."
languages.original_text: "We will follow. For now, we will hold off any heretics who might try to crawl in through the cracks to join the main assault, and we'll take a look at the generators while we're at it. Those villains made a mess of the cables... Oh, I wish we had a technomat with us, but we'll see what we can do without one."

traits.locale_text: "Biz de peşinizden geleceğiz. Şimdilik sağdan soldan fırlayıp ana saldırıya katılmaya kalkışan kâfirleri püskürtelim ve hazır buradayken jeneratörlere de göz atalım. Şer uşakları, kabloları perişan etmişler. Keşke bir teknomatonumuz olsaydı... Neyse, onsuz elimizden ne gelir, bakalım."
